cards.title: Getting Around
cards.message: Plan ahead, expect traffic delays, be patient, and consider carpooling or biking. Use the code GOOGLEIO16 to get $10 off uberPOOL rides.
cards.short_message: Plan your ride here. Use GOOGLEIO16 to get $10 off uberPool & Lyft Line.

cards.title: Shuttle Service
cards.message: Event shuttles will be provided to Google I/O attendees at no charge for attendees. You must show your Google I/O confirmation email or conference badge to board all Google I/O event shuttles.
cards.short_message: Event shuttles will be provided to attendees showing I/O Badges at no charge.

cards.title: Play in the Sandbox
cards.message: Get hands-on with our latest APIs and tools in the developer sandbox.
cards.short_message: Get hands-on with our latest APIs and tools in the developer sandbox.

cards.title: After Hours
cards.message: Stick around after sessions end for the After Hours Art House on Thursday, featuring Google's own Cultural Institute.
cards.short_message: Stick around for the After Hours Art House on Thursday.
